text: t harming yourself or attempting suicide, tell someone who can help immediately. - Call your doctor.  - Call 911 for emergency services.  - Go to the nearest hospital emergency room.  - Call the toll-free, 24-hour hotline of the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK (1-800-273-8255); TTY: 1-800-799-4TTY (4889) to be connected to a trained counselor at a suicide crisis center nearest you.
